description:
Black Friday is the perfect time to pick up a laptop, desktop, or other tantalizing PC gear. But there are also a bunch of more mundane products that are on sale too — and they’re just begging to be bought while the goings are cheap.

I’m talking about USB cables, docking stations, desk accessories, and the like. You know — things that you need but you might not often shop for. When the Black Friday and Cyber Monday discounts are this good, it’s a great time to restock those items and save a bundle. Be sure to browse and snap up a bargain when you can.

description:
Black Friday is a great opportunity to save money on streaming with deals from Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max, and other streaming service as well as on streaming devices, but it can also be a big waste of money.

With so many companies offering streaming deals this week, you’ll need to be judicious with your spending. Otherwise, you’ll wind up overspending, subscribing to services you never use, or watching on subpar streaming devices.

Here are the Black Friday streaming deals that I think are overrated, along with the genuine bargains you should consider instead:

title: 7 Black Friday streaming deals to avoid (and 6 you should jump on)

description:
Once again, the holiday deals season is upon us. Now, besides just encompassing Black Friday and Cyber Monday, Amazon has designated this week “Black Friday Week,” meaning you can start taking advantage of big savings now. Granted, sifting through it all can feel overwhelming, which is where PCWorld’s tech experts come in.

This guide to the best Amazon Black Friday and Cyber Monday tech deals will point you to the best bargains in all the most popular tech categories.

How we pick deals

Every pick is vetted by one of PCWorld’s expert reviewers based on either hands-on experience with the product, a comparative evaluation of specs and price, positive user feedback and brand reputation, or any combination of those factors. For a better idea of our review process, see our articles

description:
Dread the prospect of climbing a ladder each winter to hang string lights from your eaves? With a set of permanent outdoor lights, you only must risk life and limb once to keep your home lit with holiday cheer. 

These twinkling smart lights are designed to stay put all year round. Weatherized against the elements, permanent outdoor lights can be affixed to your home with a combination of adhesive and screws, and you can operate them on schedules, control them with mobile apps, or turn them on and off compatible voice assistants like Alexa and Google’s Gemini for Home. 

If you haven’t already festooned your abode with colorful permanent outdoor lights, now is the perfect time to start. Amazon, Best Buy, and other retailers are dishing out steep Black Friday discounts on permanent outdoor lights from Govee, Lepro, Eufy, and more. We’ve al
